response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $1,200,000, but I understand its true worth to you might be even higher. I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $950,000, hoping this will be within your budget and allow you to make the most of this valuable asset. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with this offer. I am here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 950000}
